# Context


Advice on the stock status of American Lobster (Homarus americanus) in Lobster Fishing Area (LFA) 35 is requested annually by Fisheries Management. The last assessment of this stock occurred on September 2019 (DFO 2020 ...2020/nn). This document will be the first update since the 2019 assessment. The assessment identified three primary indicators that describe changes in lobster abundance and biomass, as well as proposed reference points for each indicator. A framework for LFAs 35-38 was completed in Janurary 2019.This Science Response updates these indicators to the end of the 2019-2020 fishing season. This Science Response Report results from the Science Response Process of August 20th 2020, on the Stock Status Update of American Lobster in Lobster Fishing Area (LFAs) 35.
